en: You will have seen this photograph somewhere.
zh: 你一定在某个地方见过这张照片。

en: You don't have to answer this question.
zh: 你不必回答这个问题。

en: Do you want this watch mended?
zh: 你想把这块手表修理好吗？

en: How do you account for this situation?
zh: 你如何解释这种情况？

en: How do you account for this fact?
zh: 你如何解释这个事实？

en: What do you have to do with this matter?
zh: 你和这件事有什么关系？

en: Had you seen snow before you came to this town?
zh: 你来这个镇之前见过雪吗？

en: You're not an expert at this job any more than I am.
zh: 你和我一样，都不是这个工作的专家。

en: Have you read this article?
zh: 你读过这篇文章吗？

en: You can't apply this rule to every case.
zh: 你不能把这条规则应用于所有情况。

en: Are you the owner of this house?
zh: 你是这房子的主人吗？

en: By whom did you get this English composition corrected?
zh: 你的这篇英语作文是谁帮你修改的？

en: You have only to push this button.
zh: 你只需要按这个按钮。

en: Do you want this present delivered?
zh: 你想把这份礼物送过去吗？

en: Since you're a member of this sports club, you'll have to conform to its rules.
zh: 既然你是这个运动俱乐部的成员，你就必须遵守它的规则。

en: You look your best in this suit.
zh: 你穿这套西装最好看。

en: I suggest you keep out of this.
zh: 我建议你不要插手这件事。

en: Do you have something to do with this group?
zh: 你和这个团体有什么关系吗？

en: Do you know how to use this camera?
zh: 你知道怎么用这台相机吗？

en: Have you ever heard this opera sung in Italian?
zh: 你有没有听过用意大利语演唱这部歌剧？

en: You've made remarkable progress in English in the past year.
zh: 过去一年，你的英语取得了显著的进步。

en: You haven't mentioned cost, and I won't sign until I know the bottom line.
zh: 你没有提到成本，在知道最终价格之前我不会签字。

en: You do not have to come here.
zh: 你不必来这里。

en: Are you a teacher here or a student?
zh: 你是这里的老师还是学生？

en: You would do well to stay here.
zh: 你最好留在这里。

en: Now that you are here, you can help do the cleaning.
zh: 既然你来了，就可以帮忙打扫卫生。

en: You may as well start at once as stay here.
zh: 你与其留在这里，不如立刻开始。

en: You have only to wait here.
zh: 你只需要在这里等着。

en: You shouldn't eat here.
zh: 你不应该在这里吃东西。

en: You don't run here.
zh: 你不能在这里跑步。

en: You can not swim here.
zh: 你不能在这里游泳。

en: You drink too much coffee.
zh: 你喝太多咖啡了。

en: You must be Miss Kenny.
zh: 你一定是肯尼小姐。

en: You are far from a careful driver.
zh: 你远不是一个细心的司机。

en: You should have Mr Green correct your English pronunciation.
zh: 你应该让格林先生纠正你的英语发音。

en: Do you care for classical music?
zh: 你喜欢古典音乐吗？

en: You are a pretty girl.
zh: 你是个漂亮的女孩。

en: Have you heard of a bird called the Arctic Tern?
zh: 你听说过一种叫北极燕鸥的鸟吗？

en: Did you go straight home after school yesterday?
zh: 你昨天放学后直接回家了吗？

en: What did you do yesterday?
zh: 你昨天做了什么？

en: I believe that you will succeed.
zh: 我相信你会成功的。

en: Have you ever learned how to play the guitar?
zh: 你有没有学过弹吉他？

en: You ought to be ashamed to cheat on exams.
zh: 你不应该在考试中作弊，你应该感到羞愧。

en: You do your best to put such thoughts out of his head.
zh: 你尽力把这些想法从他脑海中赶走。

en: Not only you but also I am in the wrong.
zh: 不只是你，我也有错。

en: What did you do with your camera?
zh: 你把你的相机弄到哪里去了？

en: You've made a good many mistakes.
zh: 你犯了不少错误。

en: Did you call your friend in Canada?
zh: 你给在加拿大的朋友打电话了吗？

en: You need not stand up.
zh: 你不用站起来。

en: You take after your mother. You remind me of her.
zh: 你很像你的母亲。你让我想起了她。

en: You must help your mother.
zh: 你必须帮助你的母亲。

en: You speak like your mother.
zh: 你说话像你的母亲。

en: You look just like your mother.
zh: 你看起来和你母亲一模一样。

en: Do you remember your father's birthday?
zh: 你记得你父亲的生日吗？

en: You had better help your father.
zh: 你最好帮助你的父亲。

en: Are you going to write to your father?
zh: 你要给你父亲写信吗？

en: Can you do with a light meal for lunch?
zh: 你午餐吃点便饭可以吗？

en: Do you like tea or coffee?
zh: 你喜欢茶还是咖啡？

en: You are nodding over your work.
zh: 你工作时在打瞌睡。

en: Do you think he is dead?
zh: 你认为他死了吗？

en: What do you do in your spare time?
zh: 你空闲时间做什么？

en: You should be more careful with your money.
zh: 你应该更小心用钱。

en: You should get your eyes examined by the doctor.
zh: 你应该让医生检查一下你的眼睛。

en: You know many interesting places, don't you?
zh: 你知道很多有趣的地方，不是吗？

en: Do you know which of okra and natto is more gooey?
zh: 你知道秋葵和纳豆哪个更粘稠吗？

en: Do you mean to do without an overcoat?
zh: 你是打算不穿大衣吗？

en: Do you come from Austria or Australia?
zh: 你来自奥地利还是澳大利亚？

en: Were you younger than Ellen?
zh: 你比艾伦小吗？

en: You are welcomed in our class.
zh: 你受到我们班级的欢迎。

en: You were flat on your back for two weeks with influenza.
zh: 你因为流感已经卧床两周了。

en: You must write your name in ink.
zh: 你必须用墨水写你的名字。

en: You might avoid an unpleasant experience.
zh: 你或许可以避免一次不愉快的经历。

en: When are you busy?
zh: 你什么时候忙？

en: When do you study?
zh: 你什么时候学习？

en: When did you see him?
zh: 你什么时候见到他的？

en: When do you go back to Japan?
zh: 你什么时候回日本？

en: When will you go back to Japan?
zh: 你什么时候会回日本？

en: When did you come back from Tokyo?
zh: 你什么时候从东京回来的？

en: When do you run?
zh: 你什么时候跑步？

en: When did you finish writing the letter?
zh: 你什么时候写完这封信的？

en: When are you going to call me?
zh: 你什么时候给我打电话？

en: When do you come and see me?
zh: 你什么时候来看我？

en: When do you start for Sado?
zh: 你什么时候出发去佐渡？

en: When will you come back to school?
zh: 你什么时候回学校？

en: When did you get home?
zh: 你什么时候回家的？

en: You may fall ill at any moment.
zh: 你随时都可能生病。

en: You're always complaining!
zh: 你总是抱怨！

en: You are always complaining about your husband.
zh: 你总是抱怨你的丈夫。

en: You always called me from her house.
zh: 你总是从她家给我打电话。

en: You always reserve the same room.
zh: 你总是预订同一个房间。

en: Do you always have coffee with your breakfast?
zh: 你早餐总是喝咖啡吗？

en: You are always late.
zh: 你总是迟到。

en: You should always tell the truth.
zh: 你应该永远说实话。

en: You don't have to be perfect all the time.
zh: 你不必一直都完美。

en: What time do you usually turn in?
zh: 你通常几点睡觉？

en: When do you practice the piano?
zh: 你什么时候练钢琴？

en: When did you visit New York?
zh: 你什么时候去的纽约？

en: You will be welcome at any time.
zh: 你随时来都欢迎。

en: When are you going to quit smoking?
zh: 你打算什么时候戒烟？

en: When did you finish the work?
zh: 你什么时候完成的工作？

en: When did you finish writing the report?
zh: 你什么时候写完的报告？

en: When did you begin playing golf?
zh: 你什么时候开始打高尔夫的？

en: When are you to leave here?
zh: 你什么时候离开这里？

en: You will always be welcome whenever you come.
zh: 你无论什么时候来都受欢迎。

en: You will know the truth one day.
zh: 总有一天你会知道真相的。

en: How long have you been busy?
zh: 你忙了多久了？

en: How long have you studied?
zh: 你学了多久了？

en: How long have you lived in Sanda?
zh: 你在三田住了多久了？

en: You will be sorry for it some day.
zh: 总有一天你会后悔的。

en: How many rooms do you have?
zh: 你们有几个房间？

en: How many apples do you want?
zh: 你想要几个苹果？

en: You differ from me in some ways.
zh: 你在某些方面和我不同。

en: Do you have any apples?
zh: 你有苹果吗？

en: Do you have a part time job?
zh: 你有一份兼职工作吗？

en: Can you tell the difference between an American and a Canadian?
zh: 你能分辨出美国人和加拿大人吗？

en: Are you American or French?
zh: 你是美国人还是法国人？

en: Would you like to visit the United States?
zh: 你想去美国看看吗？

en: You are an American boy.
zh: 你是一个美国男孩。

en: I hear that you are going to the United States.
zh: 我听说你要去美国了。

en: You will miss Japanese food in the United States.
zh: 你到美国会想念日本菜的。

en: Do you think we should import rice from the U.S.?
zh: 你觉得我们应该从美国进口大米吗？

en: You had better not sit up late up night.
zh: 你最好不要熬夜。

en: You are all too quick.
zh: 你们都太快了。

en: You look at that tree.
zh: 你看看那棵树。

en: You didn't seem to want that book.
zh: 你好像不想要那本书。

en: You look nice in that red sweater.
zh: 你穿那件红色毛衣很好看。

en: Do you think that dress suits her?
zh: 你觉得那件连衣裙适合她吗？

en: Can you see that small house?
zh: 你能看到那间小房子吗？

en: What did you do with that car?
zh: 你把那辆车怎么处理了？

en: Do you know that crying boy?
zh: 你认识那个哭泣的男孩吗？

en: Do you have something to do with that company?
zh: 你和那家公司有什么关系吗？

en: You must have been surprised to meet your teacher in such a place.
zh: 你在那种地方遇到你的老师，一定很惊讶吧。

en: Do you intend to join that tennis club?
zh: 你打算加入那个网球俱乐部吗？

en: You had better consult with your teacher.
zh: 你最好和你的老师商量一下。

en: You must accept the king of Spain as your leader.
zh: 你必须接受西班牙国王作为你的领导人。

en: You may come to regret having told him about your plan.
zh: 你可能会后悔告诉他你的计划。

en: Are you going to go to Tokyo tomorrow?
zh: 你明天要去东京吗？

en: Do you think it will be fine tomorrow?
zh: 你觉得明天会是晴天吗？

en: You always bandy words with me: you never listen to me.
zh: 你总是和我争辩，从不听我的。

en: Do you believe in UFOs?
zh: 你相信有不明飞行物吗？

en: You should be back by 9 o'clock.
zh: 你应该在九点之前回来。

en: You can hear the news on the radio at nine o'clock.
zh: 你可以在九点钟在收音机里听到新闻。

en: You should arrive at school before eight.
zh: 你应该在八点之前到达学校。

en: Have you ever returned home before seven?
zh: 你曾经在七点之前回到家吗？

en: You must get up at six.
zh: 你必须六点起床。

en: You should start between six and seven.
zh: 你应该在六点到七点之间开始。

en: You came at five.
zh: 你五点来的。

en: You have three pens.
zh: 你有三支笔。

en: You have four dogs.
zh: 你有四条狗。

en: You have two flowers.
zh: 你有两朵花。

en: Have you been studying for two hours?
zh: 你学习了两个小时了吗？

en: You have never been to Okinawa, have you?
zh: 你从来没去过冲绳，是吧？

en: How many books do you read a month?
zh: 你一个月读多少本书？

en: Have you known her since 1990?
zh: 你从1990年就认识她了吗？

en: You should know better now you are eighteen.
zh: 你都十八岁了，应该更懂事了。

en: Are you going to carry on your work until ten?
zh: 你要工作到十点吗？

en: Were you home at ten?
zh: 你十点在家吗？

en: How would you define "happiness"?
zh: 你如何定义“幸福”？

en: You neglected to say "Thank you."
zh: 你忘了说“谢谢”了。

en: You should turn in your paper by next Saturday.
zh: 你最晚要在下周六之前交论文。

en: Did you accomplish your purpose?
zh: 你达到你的目的了吗？

en: Do you like to study?
zh: 你喜欢学习吗？

en: You must keep in mind that she's much younger than you.
zh: 你必须记住她比你小得多。

en: You have only to ask him if he'd like to join us.
zh: 你只要问他是否愿意加入我们就行了。

en: Do you know his birthplace?
zh: 你知道他的出生地吗？

en: Do you remember the town where he was born?
zh: 你还记得他出生的那个城镇吗？

en: You may give this picture to whoever wants it.
zh: 你可以把这张照片给任何想要它的人。

en: You bought the ticket for the train?
zh: 你买了火车票吗？

en: You had better go to bed early.
zh: 你最好早点睡觉。

en: You see everything in terms of money.
zh: 你看什么都用钱来衡量。

en: Are you a believer?
zh: 你是一个信徒吗？

en: You cannot climb!
zh: 你爬不上去！

en: You must hold up your hands.
zh: 你必须举起你的手。

en: You have to protect your family.
zh: 你必须保护你的家人。

en: Are you a student of a private high school?
zh: 你是私立高中的学生吗？

en: You think I have nothing to do; but on the contrary, I am very busy.
zh: 你以为我没事做，但恰恰相反，我非常忙。

en: Did you use my camera?
zh: 你用过我的相机吗？

en: Do you want me to make coffee?
zh: 你想让我煮咖啡吗？

en: You've sure got a short fuse today.
zh: 你今天真是一点就着。

en: Did you carry out your plan?
zh: 你执行你的计划了吗？

en: What time do you go home?
zh: 你几点回家？

en: You must study your whole life.
zh: 你必须活到老学到老。

en: Do you use a word processor?
zh: 你用文字处理软件吗？

en: Do you take part in any community activities?
zh: 你参加任何社区活动吗？

en: No matter how capable you are, you're not going to get a promotion.
zh: 无论你多么有能力，你都不会得到晋升。

en: Do you have a hobby - for example, painting?
zh: 你有什么爱好吗？比如，绘画？

en: As soon as you have done that, I would like you to start preparing supper.
zh: 你一做完那件事，我就想让你开始准备晚饭。

en: You shall see greater things than that.
zh: 你将会看到比那更大的事。

en: You should keep in touch with Mr Smith.
zh: 你应该和史密斯先生保持联系。

en: Have you ever heard her sing on the stage?
zh: 你有没有听过她在舞台上唱歌？

en: You must consider this problem as a whole.
zh: 你必须把这个问题作为一个整体来考虑。

en: You are both pretty and kind.
zh: 你们既漂亮又善良。

en: You say one thing and then act just the opposite.
zh: 你说一套，做一套。

en: Did you read that thick book?
zh: 你看过那本厚书了吗？

en: Are you satisfied with your job?
zh: 你对你的工作满意吗？

en: Remembering when I dreamed in your arms.
zh: 记得那时我还在你怀里做梦。

en: I didn't mean to eavesdrop on your talk.
zh: 我不是故意偷听你们谈话的。

en: Go on with your story. That is so interesting!
zh: 继续讲你的故事吧。太有趣了！

en: Tell me your story. I am all ears.
zh: 告诉我你的故事吧。我洗耳恭听。

en: I can't possibly think your story is true.
zh: 我简直无法相信你的故事是真的。

en: Your speech was far from satisfactory.
zh: 你的演讲远不能令人满意。

en: I can't follow you.
zh: 我听不懂你在说什么。

en: Your story doesn't square with the facts.
zh: 你的故事与事实不符。

en: You have a very crisp way of speaking.
zh: 你说话非常干脆利落。

en: I doubt your good sense.
zh: 我怀疑你的判断力。

en: Do your parents agree to your becoming a flight attendant?
zh: 你父母同意你当空姐吗？

en: Your parents kept an eye on us.
zh: 你父母一直在关注我们。

en: If your parents heard of your success, they would be proud of you.
zh: 如果你的父母听到你的成功，他们会为你感到骄傲的。

en: I'll look after your child while you are away.
zh: 你不在的时候，我会照顾你的孩子。

en: A Mr Jones came while you were out.
zh: 你出去的时候，一位琼斯先生来过。

en: I can understand your position perfectly.
zh: 我完全理解你的处境。

en: I would like to hear your honest opinion.
zh: 我想听听你的真实想法。

en: I wouldn't go so far as to say your theory is completely wrong.
zh: 我不会说你的理论完全错误。

en: I will give you whatever you want.
zh: 你想要什么我都给你。

en: Your summary leaves nothing to be desired.
zh: 你的总结无可挑剔。

en: I cannot answer your request offhand.
zh: 我不能立刻答复你的请求。

en: Your account is empty.
zh: 你的账户是空的。

en: We'll take care of reconfirmation of your reservation.
zh: 我们会负责重新确认您的预订。

en: I'm sorry I opened your mail by mistake.
zh: 对不起，我不小心打开了你的邮件。

en: Is anyone coming besides your friends?
zh: 除了你的朋友，还有其他人要来吗？

en: What time did your friend go home?
zh: 你的朋友几点回家的？

en: When did your friend leave for America?
zh: 你的朋友什么时候去美国的？

en: Say hello to your friends.
zh: 替我向你的朋友们问好。

en: If your friend reminds you kindly of your faults, take what he says not only pleasantly, but thankfully.
zh: 如果你的朋友善意地提醒你的缺点，你不仅要愉快地接受，还要心存感激。

en: I am filled with admiration for your bravery.
zh: 我非常钦佩你的勇气。

en: I bow to your superior judgement.
zh: 我服从你的英明判断。

en: Compare your translation with his.
zh: 把你的翻译和他的比较一下。

en: I appreciate your problem.
zh: 我理解你的问题。

en: Come and write your name.
zh: 过来写下你的名字。

en: Please write down your name.
zh: 请写下你的名字。

en: Tell me what your name is.
zh: 告诉我你叫什么名字。

en: Your name stands first in the list.
zh: 你的名字在名单上排在第一位。

en: Your name was dropped from the list.
zh: 你的名字从名单上删掉了。

en: How do you pronounce your name?
zh: 你的名字怎么发音？

en: Spell your name, please.
zh: 请拼写你的名字。

en: May I ask you some questions about your name?
zh: 我可以问你一些关于你名字的问题吗？

en: I will write down your name and address.
zh: 我会写下你的名字和地址。

en: Write your name and address.
zh: 写下你的名字和地址。

en: Fill in your name and address.
zh: 填写你的姓名和地址。

en: Your name was mentioned.
zh: 你的名字被提到了。

en: Your name is taped on the case.
zh: 你的名字贴在箱子上。

en: How do you spell your family name?
zh: 你的姓怎么拼？

en: When did your daughter come of age?
zh: 你的女儿什么时候成年的？

en: The day will surely come when your dreams will come true.
zh: 总有一天你的梦想会实现的。

en: Your dream will come true in the near future.
zh: 你的梦想在不久的将来会实现的。

en: Your dreams have come true.
zh: 你的梦想已经实现了。

en: May all your dreams come true!
zh: 祝你梦想成真！

en: Your pulse is normal.
zh: 你的脉搏正常。

en: To your future!
zh: 为了你的未来！

en: Your sister is the most diligent of all my friends.
zh: 你的妹妹是我所有朋友中最勤奋的。

en: Your sister can not speak English.
zh: 你的妹妹不会说英语。

en: Is your sister swimming in the river?
zh: 你的妹妹在河里游泳吗？

en: I'd like to see your sister.
zh: 我想见见你的妹妹。

en: That sister of yours is always complaining of her husband.
zh: 你那个妹妹总是抱怨她的丈夫。

en: Who does your sister take after?
zh: 你的妹妹像谁？

en: Listen to me carefully with your book closed.
zh: 合上书，仔细听我说。

en: Will you lend me your book?
zh: 你能把你的书借给我吗？

en: Lend me your book, please.
zh: 请把你的书借给我。

en: Please lend me your book.
zh: 请把你的书借给我。

en: Please take your book off this table.
zh: 请把你的书从桌子上拿走。

en: When is your book coming out?
zh: 你的书什么时候出版？

en: Here is your book.
zh: 这是你的书。

en: What is the acreage of your ranch?
zh: 你的牧场面积有多大？

en: I hope your wish will come true.
zh: 我希望你的愿望能够实现。

en: May all your wishes come true!
zh: 祝你所有的愿望都实现！

en: Your hat is similar to mine.
zh: 你的帽子和我的很相似。

en: Your hat matches your dress marvellously.
zh: 你的帽子和你的裙子非常相配。

en: Your visit has cheered him.
zh: 你的来访让他振作起来。

en: I've looked through your report and made some notes on it.
zh: 我已经看过了你的报告，并在上面做了一些笔记。

en: There are a few mistakes in your report.
zh: 你的报告里有一些错误。

en: There are few mistakes in your report.
zh: 你的报告里几乎没有错误。

en: What is your mother tongue?
zh: 你的母语是什么？

en: Your answer almost amounts to a threat.
zh: 你的回答几乎等同于威胁。

en: Please forgive me for not answering your letter.
zh: 请原谅我没有回复你的信。

en: Your dress is already out of fashion.
zh: 你的裙子已经过时了。

en: You're a month behind in your rent.
zh: 你已经拖欠了一个月的房租。

en: Did you clean your room?
zh: 你打扫你的房间了吗？

en: Where is your room?
zh: 你的房间在哪里？

en: I never thought of coming to your place.
zh: 我从没想过去你家。

en: Are there two windows in your room?
zh: 你的房间里有两扇窗户吗？

en: I'm looking forward to seeing your father.
zh: 我期待着见到你的父亲。

en: If I had known about your illness, I could have visited you in the hospital.
zh: 如果我知道你生病了，我就可以去医院看你了。

en: I hope you'll get well soon.
zh: 我希望你早日康复。

en: I perceive by your face that you have good news.
zh: 我从你的脸上看出你有好消息。

en: Your handwriting is similar to mine.
zh: 你的笔迹和我的很相似。

en: What time is your plane due to take off?
zh: 你的飞机预计几点起飞？

en: What time does your plane depart?
zh: 你的飞机几点起飞？

en: Your comments were always very helpful to me.
zh: 你的评论总是对我有很大的帮助。

en: It's your turn. Please come this way.
zh: 轮到你了。请这边走。

en: You are correct in your judgement.
zh: 你的判断是正确的。

en: What long hair you've got!
zh: 你的头发真长啊！

en: Your hair needs cutting.
zh: 你的头发需要剪了。

en: Your remark is irrelevant to our argument.
zh: 你的评论与我们的争论无关。

en: What does your remark have to do with the subject we are talking about?
zh: 你的评论和我们正在谈论的主题有什么关系？

en: Your pronunciation is more or less correct.
zh: 你的发音大致正确。

en: Write the date of your birth.
zh: 写下你的出生日期。

en: I feel like I'm being drawn into your eyes.
zh: 我感觉我被你的眼睛吸引住了。

en: We deplore your cruelty to animals.
zh: 我们谴责你虐待动物的行为。

en: You will be paid according as you work.
zh: 你会根据你的工作量获得报酬。

en: Your headache comes from overwork.
zh: 你的头痛是由于过度劳累引起的。

en: Compare your paper with the model one.
zh: 把你的论文和范文比较一下。

en: Your paper contains too many mistakes.
zh: 你的论文包含太多错误。

en: Your answer is not to the point.
zh: 你的回答没有切中要点。

en: Your answer doesn't make sense.
zh: 你的回答没有意义。

en: Your answer differs from mine.
zh: 你的答案和我的不一样。

en: Your answer is correct.
zh: 你的答案是正确的。

en: I'm not saying that your answers are always wrong.
zh: 我不是说你的答案总是错的。

en: Let's check your boarding pass.
zh: 我们来检查一下你的登机牌。

en: Did your efforts come to much?
zh: 你的努力有成果吗？

en: Your effort deserves praise.
zh: 你的努力值得称赞。

en: Your efforts resulted in the success.
zh: 你的努力带来了成功。

en: Please call on me when it is convenient for you.
zh: 当你方便的时候，请来拜访我。

en: Could you please re-schedule the meeting at your convenience?
zh: 您能否在您方便的时候重新安排会议？

en: Please come to meet me some time when it's convenient.
zh: 请在你方便的时候来见我。

en: Your proposal is worthy of being considered.
zh: 你的提议值得考虑。

en: Your suggestion seems irrelevant to our discussion here.
zh: 你的建议似乎与我们这里的讨论无关。

en: Your suggestion seems reasonable.
zh: 你的建议似乎是合理的。

en: I'm all for your suggestion.
zh: 我完全赞成你的建议。

en: It has not yet been decided whether to approve of your proposal.
zh: 是否批准你的提案尚未决定。

en: Stop playing tricks on your brother.
zh: 别再捉弄你弟弟了。

en: Your subscription expires with the June issue.
zh: 你的订阅到六月份的刊物就到期了。

en: Can you show me any evidence for your statement?
zh: 你能给我看看你所说的话的证据吗？

en: I interpreted your silence as consent.
zh: 我把你的沉默理解为同意。

en: What are your strong points?
zh: 你的优点是什么？

en: I can spot you from a distance with your long, white hair.
zh: 凭着你那头长长的白发，我老远就能认出你。

en: I look forward to seeing you on my next trip to your city.
zh: 我期待着下次去你所在的城市时见到你。

en: I wish I had listened to your advice.
zh: 我真希望我听了你的建议。

en: Your advice will have no effect on them.
zh: 你的建议对他们不会有任何作用。

en: I daresay your advice will have its effect on them.
zh: 我敢说你的建议会对他们产生影响的。

en: Thanks to your advice, I got over the hardship.
zh: 多亏了你的建议，我才度过了难关。

en: Without your advice, I would have been at a loss.
zh: 如果没有你的建议，我真不知所措。

en: Acting on your advice, I've decided to exercise more regularly.
zh: 听从你的建议，我已经决定更经常地锻炼身体。

en: If it were not for your advice I would fail.
zh: 如果不是你的建议，我就会失败。

en: If it had not been for your advice, I could not have succeeded.
zh: 如果不是你的建议，我就不可能成功。

en: Had it not been for your advice he would have been ruined.
zh: 要不是你的建议，他早就完蛋了。

en: I bought a pen for your birthday present.
zh: 我买了一支钢笔作为你的生日礼物。

en: Who is your favorite actor?
zh: 你最喜欢的演员是谁？

en: I will go to see him instead of you.
zh: 我将去见他，而不是你。

en: Shall I answer this letter for you?
zh: 要我替你回这封信吗？

en: I will compensate you for your loss.
zh: 我会赔偿你的损失。

en: You are rude.
zh: 你真粗鲁。

en: You should have your son independent of you.
zh: 你应该让你的儿子独立。

en: What does your son want to be when he grows up?
zh: 你儿子长大后想做什么？

en: It won't be your fault if your son does anything wrong: he is twenty-five now, isn't he?
zh: 如果你的儿子做错了什么，那不会是你的错：他现在都二十五岁了，不是吗？

en: The address you are looking for is within a stone's throw of the city hall.
zh: 你要找的地址离市政厅很近。

en: Who sings the best of all the boys in your class?
zh: 你们班里哪个男生唱歌最好听？

en: Don't forget to give my best regards to your lovely wife.
zh: 别忘了替我向你可爱的妻子问好。

en: Do you know your forefather?
zh: 你了解你的祖先吗？

en: Your goodwill sank into my heart.
zh: 你的善意深深地印在我的心里。

en: Look at the sign just ahead of you.
zh: 看看你前面的那个标志。

en: Your shipment should be delivered within twenty four hours.
zh: 你的货物应该在二十四小时内送达。

en: Your explanation is too abstract to me.
zh: 你的解释对我来说太抽象了。

en: Please show me your stamp album.
zh: 请给我看看你的集邮册。

en: Don't leave your baby crying.
zh: 别让你的宝宝哭。

en: Is your baby sleeping?
zh: 你的宝宝在睡觉吗？

en: I didn't think this was your seat.
zh: 我以为这不是你的座位。

en: I misplaced your blue pen.
zh: 我把你的蓝笔弄丢了。

en: Your voice reminds me of my late grandmother.
zh: 你的声音让我想起了我已故的奶奶。

en: I am happy to hear your voice.
zh: 我很高兴听到你的声音。

en: I would like to hear your voice, too.
zh: 我也很想听听你的声音。

en: Your voice reminds me of your mother.
zh: 你的声音让我想起了你的妈妈。

en: Your student called me.
zh: 你的学生给我打过电话。

en: Your students have given us new hope.
zh: 你们的学生给了我们新的希望。

en: I hope for your success.
zh: 我希望你成功。

en: I am delighted at your success.
zh: 我很高兴你成功。

en: How do you pronounce your last name?
zh: 你的姓怎么发音？

en: Please allow me to measure you.
zh: 请允许我给你量一下。

en: I didn't catch your last name.
zh: 我没听清你的姓。

en: I can't thank you enough for your kindness.
zh: 我对你的好意感激不尽。

en: Your guess is quite wrong.
zh: 你猜的完全不对。

en: Your guess is wrong.
zh: 你猜错了。

en: Your prompt reply is urgently required.
zh: 急需你的及时回复。

en: What is your ultimate goal in your life?
zh: 你的人生终极目标是什么？

en: I don't care about your race or age or religion.
zh: 我不在乎你的种族、年龄或宗教。

en: One of the greatest dangers in your human relations is self-centeredness.
zh: 人际关系中最大的危险之一就是以自我为中心。

en: How tall are you, and how much do you weigh?
zh: 你身高多少，体重多少？

en: I will never forget your kindness.
zh: 我永远不会忘记你的恩情。

en: You were so nice to me, and I had a really pleasant trip. Thanks so much.
zh: 你对我真好，我度过了一次非常愉快的旅行。非常感谢。

en: I am much obliged to you for your kindness.
zh: 我非常感谢你的好意。

en: We're very grateful for your hospitality.
zh: 我们非常感谢你们的热情款待。

en: I'll treasure your kind words.
zh: 我会珍惜你的好话。

en: I'm willing to accept your offer.
zh: 我愿意接受你的提议。

en: I'll accept your offer.
zh: 我会接受你的提议。

en: I'll give you our answer after we go into your proposal in greater detail.
zh: 在更详细地研究你的提案后，我们会给你答复。

en: I am willing to take your offer.
zh: 我愿意接受你的提议。

en: Your new car looks awfully expensive to me.
zh: 我看你的新车非常昂贵。

en: I cannot help admiring your new car.
zh: 我忍不住欣赏你的新车。

en: Could you enlarge on your new theory?
zh: 你能详细说明一下你的新理论吗？

en: Your new friends may laugh at some of the things you do.
zh: 你的新朋友可能会嘲笑你的一些行为。

en: I just adore your new hat.
zh: 我太喜欢你的新帽子了。

en: I have to put down your new address.
zh: 我得记下你的新地址。

en: Let me know your new address.
zh: 告诉我你的新地址。

en: Is your new car behaving well?
zh: 你的新车性能好吗？

en: You had better supplement your diet with vitamins.
zh: 你最好用维生素补充你的饮食。

en: No matter what your profession, or how happy you may be in it, there are moments when you wish you had chosen some other career.
zh: 无论你从事什么职业，或者你对它有多满意，总会有那么一些时候，你希望自己选择了其他的职业。

en: Your analysis of the situation is accurate.
zh: 你对情况的分析是准确的。

en: Your train leaves from Platform 10.
zh: 你的火车从10号站台出发。

en: What flight were you on?
zh: 你乘坐的是哪个航班？

en: How do you like your boss's plan?
zh: 你觉得你老板的计划怎么样？

en: If your boss "sacks" you, it means you're fired.
zh: 如果你的老板“解雇”你，那就意味着你被炒鱿鱼了。

en: How old is your elder son?
zh: 你大儿子多大了？

en: Your detailed explanation of the situation has let me see the light.
zh: 你对情况的详细解释让我茅塞顿开。

en: I am sure your promotion was timely and well deserved.
zh: 我确信你的晋升是及时的，也是当之无愧的。

en: Can I be of any assistance to you?
zh: 有什么我可以帮到你的吗？

en: If it had not been for your help, he would have been ruined.
zh: 如果不是你的帮助，他早就完蛋了。

en: I deeply appreciate your advice and kindness.
zh: 我非常感谢你的建议和善意。

en: We do need your advice.
zh: 我们确实需要你的建议。

en: But for your help I could not have got over the hardship.
zh: 要不是你的帮助，我不可能克服困难。

en: But for your help, I would have failed.
zh: 要不是你的帮助，我就失败了。

en: But for your help, we should not have finished in time.
zh: 要不是你的帮助，我们不可能及时完成。

en: If it were not for your help, I could not have succeeded.
zh: 如果不是你的帮助，我不可能成功。

en: What are you going to do with your first pay?
zh: 你打算怎么用你的第一笔工资？

en: Let's leave when you are ready.
zh: 你准备好了我们就走吧。

en: I will see to it that everything is ready for your departure.
zh: 我会确保一切都为你出发做好准备。

en: What should we do with this white elephant your aunt gave us? It's way too ugly to go on the wall.
zh: 我们该拿你阿姨给我们的这个累赘怎么办？丑得都没法挂在墙上。

en: I want to talk with your uncle.
zh: 我想和你的叔叔谈谈。

en: Let me know your address.
zh: 告诉我你的地址。

en: Don't read evil intentions into the ordinary actions of people around you.
zh: 不要把周围人的普通行为解读为恶意。

en: Your job hangs by a thread.
zh: 你的工作岌岌可危。

en: Tell me what your hobby is.
zh: 告诉我你的爱好是什么。

en: Please tell me about your hobbies.
zh: 请你告诉我你的爱好。

en: If it had not been for your help, I might have failed.
zh: 如果不是你的帮助，我可能就失败了。

en: Your letter crossed mine.
zh: 你的信和我发的信错开了。

en: I think your letter is under that book.
zh: 我觉得你的信在那本书下面。

en: It was careless of me to forget to answer your letter.
zh: 我忘了回你的信，真是太粗心了。

en: Your hands need washing.
zh: 你的手需要洗洗了。

en: Would you mind my moving your car?
zh: 你介意我挪一下你的车吗？

en: Would you mind if I used your car?
zh: 你介意我用一下你的车吗？

en: This car of yours is a real gas guzzler.
zh: 你的这辆车真是个油老虎。

en: Your car exceeded the speed limit.
zh: 你的车超速了。

en: Your car handles easily.
zh: 你的车很好操控。

en: Your car is three times as big as this one.
zh: 你的车是这辆车的三倍大。

en: Your car was washed by Ken.
zh: 你的车是肯洗的。

en: I will make up for the damage I did to your car.
zh: 我会赔偿我对你的车造成的损害。

en: May I take a picture of you?
zh: 我可以给你拍张照片吗？

en: Show your photograph.
zh: 展示你的照片。

en: Can I keep one of your pictures?
zh: 我可以保留你的一张照片吗？

en: Your question is very hard to answer.
zh: 你的问题很难回答。

en: Your question is hard to answer.
zh: 你的问题不好回答。

en: It is a matter of principle with him to answer your questions honestly.
zh: 诚实地回答你的问题是他的原则问题。

en: Lend me your dictionary, please.
zh: 请把你的字典借给我用一下。

en: Will you lend your dictionary to me?
zh: 你可以把你的字典借给我吗？

en: Can I use your dictionary?
zh: 我可以用你的字典吗？

en: I've had enough of your boasts.
zh: 我受够了你的吹嘘。

en: Can you account for your car accident?
zh: 你能解释一下你的车祸吗？

en: Lend me your bicycle.
zh: 把你的自行车借我用一下。

en: Your bicycle is better than mine.
zh: 你的自行车比我的好。

en: You will find your bicycle somewhere in the neighborhood of the station.
zh: 你会在车站附近的某个地方找到你的自行车。

en: After you with the salt.
zh: 请你先用盐。

en: Your watch is superior in quality to mine.
zh: 你的手表质量比我的好。

en: I will have repaired your watch by tomorrow.
zh: 我明天之前会把你的手表修好。

en: Your watch is on the desk.
zh: 你的手表在桌子上。

en: Your watch has been found.
zh: 你的手表找到了。

en: Does your watch keep good time?
zh: 你的手表走时准吗？

en: Try to make good use of your time.
zh: 尽量好好利用你的时间。

en: Shall I come to your office?
zh: 我需要去你的办公室吗？

en: A 10% tax will be withheld from the payment to you.
zh: 支付给你的款项将扣除10%的税。

en: I'll do it according to your instructions.
zh: 我会按照你的指示去做。

en: It was my book that your child tore to pieces.
zh: 是你的孩子把我的书撕成碎片的。

en: What's your older sister doing now?
zh: 你姐姐现在在做什么？

en: Your sister is a good pianist, isn't she?
zh: 你姐姐是个优秀的钢琴家，不是吗？

en: I want the same dictionary that your sister has.
zh: 我想要和你姐姐一样的字典。

en: You've finished your work.
zh: 你已经完成你的工作了。

en: I'm afraid the job I've got for you won't be easy.
zh: 恐怕我给你的这份工作不会轻松。

en: Your work is not altogether satisfactory.
zh: 你的工作并不完全令人满意。

en: Your work is far from being satisfactory.
zh: 你的工作远不能令人满意。

en: Let me help you to do the work.
zh: 我来帮你做这项工作吧。

en: You won't succeed unless you attend to your work.
zh: 除非你专心工作，否则你不会成功的。

en: Just go about your business and don't keep looking at me.
zh: 做你自己的事，别老盯着我看。

en: We will meet after you have finished your work.
zh: 等你完成工作后我们会见面。

en: I will carry it out if you agree to our plan.
zh: 如果你同意我们的计划，我就会执行。

en: May I accompany you on your walk?
zh: 我可以陪你散步吗？

en: We encourage your participation.
zh: 我们鼓励你的参与。

en: Can I borrow your umbrella?
zh: 我可以借用你的雨伞吗？

en: Your composition is not altogether bad.
zh: 你的作文并非完全不好。

en: Your composition is far from perfect.
zh: 你的作文远非完美。

en: There are few, if any, errors in your composition.
zh: 你的作文几乎没有错误。

en: Would you show us some samples of your work?
zh: 你可以给我们展示一些你的作品样本吗？

en: Let me sample your cake.
zh: 我尝尝你的蛋糕。

en: Your purse is similar to mine.
zh: 你的钱包和我的相似。

en: Your wallet is on the television set.
zh: 你的钱包在电视机上。

en: We are counting on you for financial help.
zh: 我们指望你在经济上帮助我们。

en: It's much cheaper to live on grains and vegetables you can grow in your garden.
zh: 自己种粮食和蔬菜吃要便宜得多。

en: I would like to get your latest catalogue.
zh: 我想得到你最新的目录。

en: Do you have a recent photo of yourself?
zh: 你有最近的照片吗？

en: Your left eye is congested.
zh: 你的左眼充血了。

en: You'll see the store on your left.
zh: 你会在你的左边看到那家商店。

en: Tell me something about your country.
zh: 告诉我一些关于你的国家的事情。

en: Do you have much snow in your country?
zh: 你们国家经常下雪吗？

en: Do you eat seaweed in your country?
zh: 你们国家吃海藻吗？

en: Do people drink tea in your country?
zh: 你们国家的人喝茶吗？

en: Your conduct allows of no excuse.
zh: 你的行为不可原谅。

en: Your behavior does not come up to my expectations.
zh: 你的行为没有达到我的期望。

en: We ask you to account for your conduct.
zh: 我们要求你解释你的行为。

en: I will follow you wherever you go.
zh: 无论你去哪里，我都会跟着你。

en: Your conduct gave rise to another problem.
zh: 你的行为引起了另一个问题。

en: I really agree with what you're saying.
zh: 我非常同意你所说的。

en: Please tell me what you think.
zh: 请告诉我你的想法。

en: Your idea is similar to mine.
zh: 你的想法和我的相似。

en: Your ideas are in accord with ours.
zh: 你的想法和我们的想法一致。

en: Your ideas are hardly practical.
zh: 你的想法几乎不切实际。

en: Your ideas are all out of date.
zh: 你的想法都过时了。

en: Your idea is, as it were, a castle in the air.
zh: 你的想法，可以这么说，就像空中楼阁。

en: I don't know your preference, so please help yourself.
zh: 我不知道你的偏好，所以请随便。

en: You may choose any book you like.
zh: 你可以选择任何你喜欢的书。

en: You may give the ticket to whomever you like.
zh: 你可以把票给任何你喜欢的人。

en: What's your favorite food?
zh: 你最喜欢的食物是什么？

en: Who is your favorite composer?
zh: 你最喜欢的作曲家是谁？

en: Who is your favorite author?
zh: 你最喜欢的作家是谁？

en: You can spend your time in any way you want; it's your time, after all.
zh: 你可以用任何你想要的方式度过你的时间；毕竟这是你的时间。

en: You can have any you want.
zh: 你想要哪个都可以。

en: What is your favorite TV program?
zh: 你最喜欢的电视节目是什么？

en: I'll buy you whatever clothes you want.
zh: 你想买什么衣服我都给你买。

en: I am very pleased to hear of your success.
zh: 我很高兴听到你成功了。

en: We are grateful to you for your help.
zh: 我们感谢你的帮助。

en: Please close the door behind you.
zh: 请随手关门。

en: He is always at your back.
zh: 他总是支持你。

en: After you with the pepper.
zh: 你先请用胡椒粉。

en: Judging from what you say, he must be a great writer.
zh: 听你这么说，他一定是一位伟大的作家。

en: Don't you think you're putting the cart before the horse?
zh: 你这不是本末倒置吗？

en: What you are saying is absolutely wrong.
zh: 你说的完全是错的。

en: I don't understand what you are talking about.
zh: 我不明白你在说什么。

en: Your remarks were out of place.
zh: 你说的话不合时宜。

en: What you said is not true.
zh: 你说的不是真的。

en: What you said is, in a sense, true.
zh: 你说的，从某种意义上说，是真的。

en: What you said is right in a sense, but it made her angry.
zh: 你说的在某种意义上是对的，但她生气了。

en: Your remarks were rather out of place.
zh: 你说的话有点不合时宜。

en: I can't fathom what you said.
zh: 我无法理解你说了什么。

en: I guess you're right, Jane.
zh: 我想你是对的，简。

en: Granting that you are right, we still can't approve of your plan.
zh: 就算你是对的，我们仍然不能批准你的计划。

en: Maybe you're right.
zh: 也许你是对的。

en: You may be right about that.
zh: 你可能在那件事上是对的。

en: Admitting what you say, I still think he is wrong.
zh: 就算你说的对，我仍然认为他是错的。

en: While I see what you say, I can't agree with you.
zh: 我明白你的意思，但我不能同意你。

en: I cannot agree with you on the matter.
zh: 在这个问题上我不能同意你。

en: I cannot follow you.
zh: 我不明白你的意思。

en: We will check to see if what you have said is really the truth.
zh: 我们会核实你所说的是否属实。

en: I understand what you mean.
zh: 我明白你的意思。

en: Accepting what you say, I'm still against the project.
zh: 就算你说的对，我仍然反对这个项目。

en: You could be right, I suppose.
zh: 我想你可能是对的。

en: It is difficult to believe what you say.
zh: 很难相信你所说的话。

en: What you say does not make any sense to me.
zh: 我听不懂你在说什么。

en: What you say is true in a sense.
zh: 你说的在某种意义上是真的。

en: I can not but admit the truth of your remarks.
zh: 我不得不承认你说的是实话。

en: Could you tell me your present address?
zh: 你能告诉我你现在的地址吗？

en: Please tell me your present address.
zh: 请告诉我你现在的地址。

en: Your views are quite opposite to mine.
zh: 你的观点和我的截然相反。

en: Your research will surely bear fruit.
zh: 你的研究肯定会结出成果。

en: Your dog is big and mine is small.
zh: 你的狗很大，我的狗很小。

en: Your dog always barks at me.
zh: 你的狗总是对我叫。

en: I'm not trying to deprive you of your rights.
zh: 我不是想剥夺你的权利。

en: I am anxious about your health.
zh: 我担心你的健康。

en: What's your blood group?
zh: 你的血型是什么？

en: I'm really pleased at the news of your marriage.
zh: 听到你结婚的消息我真高兴。

en: There are few but admire your resolution.
zh: 很少有人不佩服你的决心。

en: Even your faults do not lessen my respect for you, and in friendship this is what counts.
zh: 即使是你的缺点也不会减少我对你的尊重，而在友谊中，这才是最重要的。

en: Your words of encouragement meant a lot to me.
zh: 你的鼓励对我意义重大。

en: Without your encouragement, I should have given up the plan.
zh: 如果没有你的鼓励，我早就放弃这个计划了。

en: A favorable review of your play will appear in the next issue.
zh: 下一期将会刊登一篇对你戏剧的正面评论。

en: Your plan must fit in with mine.
zh: 你的计划必须和我的相符。

en: Tell me all about your plan.
zh: 告诉我你计划的一切。

en: Your plan is a good one, but mine is a better one.
zh: 你的计划很好，但我的计划更好。

en: Your plan requires a large amount of money.
zh: 你的计划需要大量的资金。

en: Your plan has the virtue of being practical.
zh: 你的计划的优点在于它的实用性。

en: Your plan is not in line with our policy.
zh: 你的计划不符合我们的政策。

en: Your plan is sure to succeed.
zh: 你的计划肯定会成功。

en: I agree to your plan.
zh: 我同意你的计划。

en: I want to be in your plan.
zh: 我想参与你的计划。

en: I will not object to your plan.
zh: 我不会反对你的计划。

en: I'm all for your plan.
zh: 我完全赞成你的计划。

en: I can't keep pace with your plan.
zh: 我跟不上你的计划。

en: You cannot depend on his support for your project.
zh: 你的项目不能依赖他的支持。

en: I hope your plan will work out.
zh: 我希望你的计划能成功。

en: May we know your bank account?
zh: 我们可以知道你的银行账户吗？

en: Read such books as interest you.
zh: 读你感兴趣的书。

en: Should I have asked your permission?
zh: 我应该事先征求你的许可吗？

en: Is your salary adequate to support your family?
zh: 你的工资足够养家糊口吗？

en: Is your salary keeping up with inflation?
zh: 你的工资能跟上通货膨胀吗？

en: You will be paid a stable base salary plus commissions on sale.
zh: 你将获得稳定的基本工资加上销售佣金。

en: You should try to conquer your smoking habit.
zh: 你应该努力戒烟。

en: Your argument came across well.
zh: 你的论点表达得很清楚。

en: Your duty is to support your family.
zh: 你的职责是养家糊口。

en: If it weren't for your invaluable help, everything would be ruined.
zh: 如果没有你宝贵的帮助，一切都会毁了。

en: Your prayer will be answered.
zh: 你的祈祷会得到回应的。

en: I know exactly how you feel.
zh: 我完全理解你的感受。

en: Could I use your desk?
zh: 我可以用一下你的桌子吗？

en: Your gift will go far towards helping to build the children's hospital.
zh: 你的礼物将为儿童医院的建设做出巨大贡献。

en: Attach a recent photograph to your application form.
zh: 请在你的申请表上附上一张近照。

en: Please give me your picture lest I forget how you look.
zh: 请给我你的照片，免得我忘了你的样子。

en: I didn't mean to hurt your feelings.
zh: 我不是故意要伤害你的感情。

en: Shall I carry your bag?
zh: 要我帮你拿包吗？

en: Which is your bag?
zh: 哪个是你的包？

en: Your college years will soon come to an end.
zh: 你的大学生涯很快就要结束了。

en: I want to know more about your school life.
zh: 我想更多地了解你的校园生活。

en: I am looking forward to visiting your school.
zh: 我期待着参观你们的学校。

en: Is your school in this town?
zh: 你们的学校在这个镇上吗？

en: Is your school far from here?
zh: 你们的学校离这里远吗？

en: How many students are there in your school?
zh: 你们学校有多少学生？

en: Could you tell me something about your school?
zh: 你能告诉我一些关于你学校的事情吗？

en: Does every boy have to learn cooking in your school?
zh: 你们学校每个男生都要学做饭吗？

en: Is Japanese taught in your school now?
zh: 你们学校现在教日语吗？

en: How many people live in your town?
zh: 你们镇上有多少人居住？

en: Your answer is anything but satisfactory to us.
zh: 你的回答对我们来说一点都不令人满意。

en: Don't lay your fault at my door.
zh: 不要把你的过错推到我身上。

en: Let me relieve you of your baggage.
zh: 我来帮你拿行李吧。

en: It looks like your luggage is on the next flight.
zh: 看起来你的行李在下一班飞机上。

en: Do you only have this bag with you?
zh: 你只有这一个包吗？

en: It's your turn to sing.
zh: 轮到你唱歌了。

en: Please write about your home.
zh: 请写一篇关于你家的文章。

en: Your family must be very nice.
zh: 你的家人一定很好。

en: We are all looking forward to seeing your family.
zh: 我们都很期待见到你的家人。

en: I had no difficulty finding your house.
zh: 我很容易就找到了你的房子。

en: Zeal for your house will consume me.
zh: 我对你家的热情将吞噬我。

en: Your house needs painting.
zh: 你的房子需要粉刷了。

en: Your house has a very cozy atmosphere.
zh: 你的房子有一个非常舒适的氛围。

en: Whose house is opposite to yours?
zh: 谁的房子在你家对面？

en: I'll pick you up at your home.
zh: 我去你家接你。

en: How about your place?
zh: 你那里怎么样？

en: How long does it take you to get here from your house by train?
zh: 从你家坐火车到这里要多久？

en: How many rooms are there on the second floor of your house?
zh: 你家二楼有几个房间？

en: Your wife ought to tell you all about it.
zh: 你妻子应该会把一切都告诉你。

en: Will you lend me your pencil?
zh: 能把你的铅笔借我用一下吗？

en: Could I use your pencil?
zh: 我可以用一下你的铅笔吗？

en: Your assistance is indispensable for us.
zh: 你的帮助对我们来说是不可或缺的。

en: Thanks to your help, we were successful.
zh: 多亏了你的帮助，我们成功了。

en: I'm very grateful for your help.
zh: 我非常感谢你的帮助。

en: I'd appreciate your help.
zh: 我会很感激你的帮助。

en: Were it not for your help, I should fail.
zh: 如果没有你的帮助，我就会失败。

en: We cannot thank you too much for your help.
zh: 我们再怎么感谢你的帮助都不为过。

en: Your help prevented me from being ruined.
zh: 你的帮助使我免于破产。

en: Without your support, we probably won't be able to put this plan into practice.
zh: 如果没有你的支持，我们可能无法将这个计划付诸实践。

en: Without your aid, I couldn't have succeeded.
zh: 如果没有你的帮助，我不可能成功。

en: Without your help, I would have failed.
zh: 如果没有你的帮助，我就会失败。

en: Had it not been for your help, I could not have done it.
zh: 如果没有你的帮助，我就不可能做到。

en: Without your help, I couldn't have finished the work.
zh: 如果没有你的帮助，我就无法完成这项工作。

en: Your English composition leaves almost nothing to be desired.
zh: 你的英语作文几乎完美无缺。

en: Your English is too good to be in this class.
zh: 你的英语太好了，不应该在这个班级里。

en: Your English leaves much to be desired.
zh: 你的英语还有待提高。

en: Let me take a look at your driver's license.
zh: 让我看看你的驾驶执照。

en: I've heard about you.
zh: 我听说过你。

en: Who is your favorite TV star?
zh: 你最喜欢的电视明星是谁？

en: How tall is your youngest brother?
zh: 你最小的弟弟有多高？

en: I'll send you your clothes and some other things next month by express delivery.
zh: 下个月我会用快递把你的衣服和其他东西寄给你。

en: Please don't limit your opinions just to 'Yes' or 'No'.
zh: 请不要把你的意见局限于“是”或“否”。

en: Your opinion sounds like a good idea.
zh: 你的意见听起来是个好主意。

en: How does your opinion differ from his?
zh: 你的意见和他有什么不同？

en: Your opinion seems to be out of date.
zh: 你的意见似乎过时了。

en: Your opinion is quite different from mine.
zh: 你的意见和我的很不一样。

en: Your idea runs counter to our policy.
zh: 你的想法与我们的政策背道而驰。

en: Your idea has no foundation at all.
zh: 你的想法根本没有根据。

en: Your ideas sound crazy.
zh: 你的想法听起来很疯狂。

en: Your opinions are right in a way.
zh: 你的意见在某种程度上是对的。

en: What's your opinion?
zh: 你的意见是什么？

en: I am for your opinion.
zh: 我支持你的意见。

en: They will give way to you if your opinion is reasonable.
zh: 如果你的意见合理，他们会听你的。

en: But for your steady support, my mission would have resulted in failure.
zh: 要不是你坚定地支持，我的任务就会失败。

en: I would like to use your word processor.
zh: 我想用你的文字处理器。

en: Your robot will prepare meals, clean, wash dishes, and perform other household tasks.
zh: 你的机器人会准备饭菜、打扫卫生、洗碗，并执行其他家务。

en: Do you think you could lend me some of your records?
zh: 你觉得你能借给我一些你的唱片吗？

en: Take a fresh look at your lifestyle.
zh: 重新审视一下你的生活方式。

en: I want to be a good player like you.
zh: 我想成为像你一样的好球员。

en: I wish I could speak English like you.
zh: 我希望我能像你一样说英语。

en: I wish I had a friend like you.
zh: 我希望我能有像你这样的朋友。

en: Because a man whose manners are as bad as yours must try everyone's patience.
zh: 因为像你这样举止粗鲁的人一定会让每个人都失去耐心。

en: Devote your whole attention to your duties.
zh: 全神贯注于你的职责。

en: Give your whole attention to what you are doing.
zh: 全神贯注于你正在做的事情。

en: I want you to live more like a human being.
zh: 我希望你活得更像个人。

en: You can have any picture that you want.
zh: 你可以要任何你喜欢的照片。

en: Your boyfriend got tired of waiting for you and left just now.
zh: 你的男朋友等你不耐烦了，刚刚走了。

en: I would like to be your pen pal.
zh: 我希望成为你的笔友。

en: Which is your pen?
zh: 哪一支是你的笔？

en: Yours is a very strange story.
zh: 你的故事非常奇怪。

en: Yours is over there.
zh: 你的在那边。

en: I was anxious to read your letter from Paris.
zh: 我急于阅读你从巴黎寄来的信。

en: Please allow me to carry your bag.
zh: 请允许我帮你拿包。

en: Your personal computer is identical with mine.
zh: 你的个人电脑和我的完全一样。

en: If it had not been for your foolishness, we would never have been in that trouble.
zh: 如果不是因为你的愚蠢，我们绝不会陷入那样的困境。

en: Please show me your notebook.
zh: 请给我看看你的笔记本。

en: I will be happy to attend your party.
zh: 我很高兴参加你的聚会。

en: Have your roses come out yet?
zh: 你的玫瑰开了吗？

en: When do you plan to check out?
zh: 你打算什么时候退房？

en: Your team is very good, but theirs is the best.
zh: 你的队伍很棒，但他们的队伍是最好的。

en: Who is your dance partner?
zh: 谁是你的舞伴？

en: I will find you your lost ring.
zh: 我会帮你找到你丢失的戒指。

en: I painted a picture for you.
zh: 我为你画了一幅画。

en: I've ordered you some dessert.
zh: 我为你点了一些甜点。

en: I think I should do it for you.
zh: 我想我应该为你做这件事。

en: Let me get you a ticket to the concert.
zh: 我帮你弄一张音乐会的票吧。

en: Shall I get some for you?
zh: 要我帮你拿一些吗？

en: I asked Mom to get some for you.
zh: 我让妈妈帮你拿一些。

en: I am quite willing to do anything for you.
zh: 我非常愿意为你做任何事。

en: Your account of the accident corresponds with the driver's.
zh: 你对事故的描述与司机的一致。

en: Your speech was appropriate for the occasion.
zh: 你的演讲很适合这个场合。

en: What's your score?
zh: 你的分数是多少？

en: Choose a dress you like.
zh: 选一件你喜欢的连衣裙。

en: Place your skis in an inverted V.
zh: 把你的滑雪板倒V字形放好。

en: Your skirt is out of fashion.
zh: 你的裙子过时了。

en: Your shirts need to be washed.
zh: 你的衬衫需要洗了。

en: Do whatever you want.
zh: 做任何你想做的事。

en: I like your sarong style skirt.
zh: 我喜欢你的纱笼式裙子。

en: May I have a signature?
zh: 我可以要一个签名吗？

en: Your site appeals to people who are interested in cats.
zh: 你的网站吸引了对猫感兴趣的人。

en: I hope that your parents will allow us to marry.
zh: 我希望你的父母会允许我们结婚。

en: Please do the work at your own convenience.
zh: 请在您方便的时候完成工作。

en: Your order is ready.
zh: 您的订单已准备好。

en: I rejoice in your success.
zh: 我为你的成功感到高兴。

en: May this letter find you well and happy!
zh: 愿此信寄到时，你一切安好，幸福快乐！

en: Your kindness really touches me.
zh: 你的善良真的感动了我。

en: I greatly appreciate your kindness.
zh: 我非常感谢你的好意。

en: We'll never forget your kindness.
zh: 我们永远不会忘记你的恩情。

en: I appreciate your invitation, but...
zh: 我很感谢你的邀请，但是...

en: I am very thankful to you for your advice.
zh: 我非常感谢你给我的建议。

en: Is your husband a picky eater?
zh: 你丈夫是个挑食的人吗？

en: I am very happy to hear about your engagement.
zh: 我很高兴听到你订婚的消息。

en: How are your studies going?
zh: 你的学习怎么样？

en: We know we may count on your cooperation.
zh: 我们知道我们可以指望你的合作。

en: I am in full accord with your view.
zh: 我完全同意你的观点。

en: I think your favourite actress is in it.
zh: 我觉得你最喜欢的女演员在里面。

en: Where did you get this photo taken?
zh: 你这张照片是在哪里拍的？

en: I can't think of you as more than a friend.
zh: 我无法把你当成比朋友更进一步的人。

en: What should I call you?
zh: 我该怎么称呼你？

en: I don't mean you.
zh: 我不是在说你。

en: I'll never forget you.
zh: 我永远不会忘记你。

en: I didn't quite catch your words.
zh: 我没太听清你说的话。

en: I hope and I know you did great!
zh: 我希望并且我知道你做得很好！

en: I am quite pleased with you.
zh: 我对你非常满意。

en: How many boys are there in your class?
zh: 你们班有多少男生？

en: How many pupils are there in your class?
zh: 你们班有多少学生？

en: Your colorful shirt really stands out.
zh: 你那件色彩鲜艳的衬衫真显眼。

en: Your bag is on my desk.
zh: 你的包在我的桌子上。

en: That sounds very interesting.
zh: 听起来很有意思。

en: Do you mind my sitting next to you?
zh: 你介意我坐在你旁边吗？

en: I am afraid I can't help you.
zh: 恐怕我帮不了你。

en: I'll be very happy if I can serve you.
zh: 如果能为您服务，我将非常高兴。

en: Could you spell your name, please?
zh: 请问您能拼一下你的名字吗？

en: What's your name and flight number?
zh: 请问您的姓名和航班号是多少？

en: Can your mother drive a car?
zh: 你妈妈会开车吗？

en: Your mother is trying to break up our marriage.
zh: 你妈妈想破坏我们的婚姻。

en: Your mother will be back before long.
zh: 你妈妈很快就会回来的。

en: Your mother will get well soon.
zh: 你妈妈很快就会好起来的。

en: Is your mother at home now?
zh: 你妈妈现在在家吗？

en: How is your mother?
zh: 你妈妈怎么样？

en: Your mother is very young, isn't she?
zh: 你妈妈很年轻，不是吗？

en: Please give my best regards to your mother.
zh: 请代我向你母亲问好。
